resources.string: Do you really want to quit?
Do you really want to abort?
Do you really want to clear all these achievements?
Do you really want to clear all these records?

Two or more adjoining squares with the same color could be cleared. 

To clear them, you need first click the squares you want, they will then be highlighted. 

Click again to clear them if you really want to. 

You could also change the SETTING to click once to clear them. This is strongly recommended in TIME MODE. 

This program is created by Team BIUBIUBIU: ComboZhc and Zoofo. 

Special thanks to Zhi Zhou, Xiao Li, Jianghao Lu, Zhoujun Ma for their advice and test.

There are several big squares, the score will be multiplied when you clear them. 

If you clear 5 or more adjoining squares, you will get bonus score. 

Your target is to clear all the squares on the screen. 

Your time is not limited.

The screen is divided into two parts. 

Every 3 seconds, a new row of squares would appear on both parts. 

You would lose if any square collides with the lightning. 

Your target is to keep clearing squares in 1 minute and prevent them from reaching the lightning. 

It is highly recommended to cooperate with your friends!

Each time you clear the squares, the black background in their positions would be filled. 

Your target is to clear squares on every position on the screen as soon as possible. 

Your time is limited.

This is a little different from classic mode in that you can use the gravity sensor to control how the squares move. 

Your target is to clear all the squares on the screen. 

Your time is limited.
Shake when the game is over
click MENU then FINISH to finish this game if there are no more moves.
I was playing Explodi in %s Mode. LOL. I got %d points in %d seconds! Where my completeness is %s and the accuracy is %s.
I even achieved a new record!
